verses.verse: Now Korah<WH7141> the son<WH1121> of Izhar,<WH3324> the son<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> the son<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> with Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram,<WH48> the sons<WH1121> of Eliab,<WH446> and On<WH203> the son<WH1121> of Peleth,<WH6431> sons<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> took<WH3947> [action,]

and they rose<WH6965> up before<WH6440> Moses,<WH4872> together with some<WH376> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> leaders<WH5387> of the congregation,<WH5712> chosen<WH7148> in the assembly,<WH4150> men<WH376> of renown.<WH8034>

And they assembled<WH6950> together against<WH5921> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> and said<WH559> to them, "You have gone far<WH7227> enough,<WH7227> for all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> are holy,<WH6918> every<WH3605> one<WH3605> of them, and the Lord<WH3068> is in their midst;<WH8432> so why<WH4069> do you exalt<WH5375> yourselves above<WH5921> the assembly<WH6951> of the Lord<WH3068>?"
When Moses<WH4872> heard<WH8085> [this,] he fell<WH5307> on his face;<WH6440>

and he spoke<WH1696> to Korah<WH7141> and all<WH3605> his company,<WH5712> saying,<WH559> "Tomorrow<WH1242> morning<WH1242> the Lord<WH3068> will show<WH3045> who<WH834> is His, and who is holy,<WH6918> and will bring<WH7126> [him] near<WH7126> to Himself; even the one whom<WH834> He will choose,<WH977> He will bring<WH7126> near<WH7126> to Himself.
"Do<WH6213> this:<WH2088> take<WH3947> censers<WH4289> for yourselves, Korah<WH7141> and all<WH3605> your company,<WH5712>

and put<WH5414> fire<WH784> in them, and lay<WH7760> incense<WH7004> upon them in the presence<WH6440> of the Lord<WH3068> tomorrow;<WH4279> and the man<WH376> whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> chooses<WH977> [shall be] the one<WH6918> who<WH1931> is holy.<WH6918> You have gone far<WH7227> enough,<WH7227> you sons<WH1121> of Levi!<WH3878> "
Then Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Korah,<WH7141> "Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> you sons<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878>

is it not enough<WH4592> for you that the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> has separated<WH914> you from the [rest of] the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> to bring<WH7126> you near<WH7126> to Himself, to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Lord,<WH3068> and to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> to minister<WH8334> to them;

and that He has brought<WH7126> you near,<WH7126> [Korah,] and all<WH3605> your brothers,<WH251> sons<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> with you? And are you seeking<WH1245> for the priesthood<WH3550> also<WH1571>?

"Therefore<WH3651> you and all<WH3605> your company<WH5712> are gathered<WH3259> together against<WH5921> the Lord;<WH3068> but as for Aaron,<WH175> who<WH4100> is he that you grumble<WH9235> against<WH5921> him?"
Then Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> a summons<WH7121> to Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram,<WH48> the sons<WH1121> of Eliab;<WH446> but they said,<WH559> "We will not come<WH5927> up.

"Is it not enough<WH4592> that you have brought<WH5927> us up out of a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706> to have us die<WH4191> in the wilderness,<WH4057> but you would also<WH1571> lord<WH8323> it over<WH5921> us?

"Indeed,<WH637> you have not brought<WH935> us into a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> nor<WH3808> have you given<WH5414> us an inheritance<WH5159> of fields<WH7704> and vineyards.<WH3754> Would you put<WH5365> out the eyes<WH5869> of these<WH1992> men<WH376>? We will not come<WH5927> up!"

Then Moses<WH4872> became<WH2734> very<WH3966> angry<WH2734> and said<WH559> to the Lord,<WH3068> "Do not regard<WH6437> their offering!<WH4503> I have not taken<WH5375> a single<WH259> donkey<WH2543> from them, nor<WH3808> have I done<WH7489> harm<WH7489> to any<WH259> of them."

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Korah,<WH7141> "You and all<WH3605> your company<WH5712> be present<WH1961> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> tomorrow,<WH4279> both you and they along with Aaron.<WH175>

"And each<WH376> of you take<WH3947> his firepan<WH4289> and put<WH5414> incense<WH7004> on it, and each<WH376> of you bring<WH7126> his censer<WH4289> before<WH6440> the Lord,<WH3068> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> firepans;<WH4289> also you and Aaron<WH175> [shall] each<WH376> [bring] his firepan.<WH4289>"

So they each<WH376> took<WH3947> his [own] censer<WH4289> and put<WH5414> fire<WH784> on it, and laid<WH7760> incense<WH7004> on it; and they stood<WH5975> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> with Moses<WH4872> and Aaron.<WH175>

Thus Korah<WH7141> assembled<WH6950> all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> against<WH5921> them at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150> And the glory<WH9202> of the Lord<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to all<WH3605> the congregation.<WH5712>
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>
"Separate<WH914> yourselves from among<WH8432> this<WH2088> congregation,<WH5712> that I may consume<WH3615> them instantly.<WH7281>"

But they fell<WH5307> on their faces,<WH6440> and said,<WH559> "O God,<WH410> Thou God<WH430> of the spirits<WH7307> of all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> when one<WH259> man<WH376> sins,<WH2398> wilt Thou be angry<WH7107> with the entire<WH3605> congregation<WH5712>?"
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to the congregation,<WH5712> saying,<WH559> 'Get<WH5927> back<WH5927> from around<WH5439> the dwellings<WH4908> of Korah,<WH7141> Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram.<WH48>'"
Then Moses<WH4872> arose<WH6965> and went<WH1980> to Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram,<WH48> with the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> following<WH1980> <WH310> him,

and he spoke<WH1696> to the congregation,<WH5712> saying,<WH559> "Depart<WH5493> now<WH4994> from the tents<WH168> of these<WH428> wicked<WH7563> men,<WH376> and touch<WH5060> nothing<WH408> <WH3605> that belongs to them, lest<WH6435> you be swept<WH5595> away<WH5595> in all<WH3605> their sin.<WH9128>"

So they got<WH5927> back<WH5927> from around<WH5439> the dwellings<WH4908> of Korah,<WH7141> Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram;<WH48> and Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram<WH48> came<WH3318> out [and] stood<WH5324> at the doorway<WH6607> of their tents,<WH168> along with their wives<WH802> and their sons<WH1121> and their little<WH2945> ones.<WH2945>

And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "By this<WH2088> you shall know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> has sent<WH7971> me to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> these<WH428> deeds;<WH4639> for this is not my doing.<WH4480> <WH3820>

"If<WH518> these<WH428> men<WH428> die<WH4191> the death<WH4194> of all<WH3605> men,<WH120> or if they suffer<WH6485> the fate<WH6486> of all<WH3605> men,<WH120> [then] the Lord<WH3068> has not sent<WH7971> me.

"But if<WH518> the Lord<WH3068> brings<WH1254> about<WH1254> an entirely<WH1278> new<WH1278> thing<WH1278> and the ground<WH127> opens<WH6475> its mouth<WH6310> and swallows<WH1104> them up with all<WH3605> that is theirs,<WH1992> and they descend<WH3381> alive<WH2416> into Sheol,<WH7585> then you will understand<WH3045> that these<WH428> men<WH376> have spurned<WH5006> the Lord.<WH3068>"
Then it came<WH1961> about as he finished<WH3615> speaking<WH1696> all<WH3605> these<WH428> words,<WH1697> that the ground<WH127> that was under<WH8478> them split<WH1234> open;<WH1234>

and the earth<WH776> opened<WH6605> its mouth<WH6310> and swallowed<WH1104> them up, and their households,<WH1004> and all<WH3605> the men<WH120> who<WH834> belonged to Korah,<WH7141> with [their] possessions.<WH7399>

So they and all<WH3605> that belonged to them went<WH3381> down<WH3381> alive<WH2416> to Sheol;<WH7585> and the earth<WH776> closed<WH3680> over<WH5921> them, and they perished from the midst<WH6> of the assembly.<WH8432>
And all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> who<WH834> [were] around<WH5439> them fled<WH5127> at their outcry,<WH6963> for they said,<WH559> "The earth<WH776> may swallow<WH1104> us up!"
Fire<WH784> also came<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from the Lord<WH3068> and consumed<WH398> the two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> men<WH376> who were offering<WH7126> the incense.<WH7004>
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Say<WH559> to Eleazar,<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> that he shall take<WH7311> up the censers<WH4289> out of the midst<WH996> of the blaze,<WH8316> for they are holy;<WH6942> and you scatter<WH2219> the burning<WH784> coals<WH784> abroad.<WH1973>

"As for the censers<WH4289> of these<WH428> men<WH2400> <WH5315> who<WH2400> have sinned<WH2400> at the cost of their lives,<WH5315> let them be made<WH6213> into hammered<WH7555> sheets<WH9449> for a plating<WH6826> of the altar,<WH4196> since<WH3588> they did present<WH7126> them before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> and they are holy;<WH6942> and they shall be for a sign<WH226> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>"

So Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the bronze<WH5178> censers<WH4289> which<WH834> the men who were burned<WH8313> had offered;<WH7126> and they hammered<WH7554> them out as a plating<WH6826> for the altar,<WH4196>

as a reminder<WH2146> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> that no<WH3808> layman<WH2114> who<WH834> is not of the descendants<WH2233> of Aaron<WH175> should come<WH7126> near<WH7126> to burn<WH6999> incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> the Lord;<WH3068> that he might not become<WH1961> like Korah<WH7141> and his company<WH5712> â€“ just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> to him through<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>

But on the next<WH4283> day<WH4283> all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> grumbled<WH9235> against<WH5921> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559> "You are the ones who have caused<WH4191> the death<WH4191> of the Lord's people.<WH5971>"

It came<WH1961> about, however, when the congregation<WH5712> had assembled<WH6950> against<WH5921> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> that they turned<WH6437> toward<WH413> the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and behold,<WH2009> the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> it and the glory<WH9202> of the Lord<WH3068> appeared.<WH7200>
Then Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> came<WH935> to the front<WH6440> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150>
and the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Get<WH7426> away<WH7426> from among<WH8432> this<WH2088> congregation,<WH5712> that I may consume<WH3615> them instantly.<WH7281>" Then they fell<WH5307> on their faces.<WH6440>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "Take<WH3947> your censer<WH4289> and put<WH5414> in it fire<WH784> from the altar,<WH4196> and lay<WH7760> incense<WH7004> [on it;] then bring<WH1980> it quickly<WH4120> to the congregation<WH5712> and make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for them, for wrath<WH7110> has gone<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from the Lord,<WH3068> the plague<WH5063> has begun!<WH2490>"

Then Aaron<WH175> took<WH3947> [it] as Moses<WH4872> had spoken,<WH1696> and ran<WH7323> into the midst<WH8432> of the assembly,<WH6951> for behold,<WH2009> the plague<WH5063> had begun<WH2490> among the people.<WH5971> So he put<WH5414> [on] the incense<WH7004> and made<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for the people.<WH5971>
And he took<WH5975> his stand<WH5975> between<WH996> the dead<WH4191> and the living,<WH2416> so that the plague<WH4046> was checked.<WH6113>
But those who died<WH4191> by the plague<WH4046> were 14700, besides<WH4480> <WH905> those who died<WH4191> on account<WH5921> <WH1697> of Korah.<WH7141>
Then Aaron<WH175> returned<WH7725> to Moses<WH4872> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> for the plague<WH4046> had been checked.<WH6113>
